```{ojs}
// GeoJSON data 
data = FileAttachment("data/ContinenteDistritos_geo.geojson").json()

// Returns colors for the parties
function getPartyColors() { 
  return { 
    "PS": "#ff0000", 
    "PPD/PSD.CDS-PP": "#ff9900", 
    "PPD/PSD.CDS-PP.PPM": "#ff8c00ff",
    "CH": "#0000ff", 
    "IL": "#00ffff", 
    "B.E.": "#ff00ff", 
    "PCP-PEV": "#008000", 
    "L": "#800080", 
    "PAN": "#00ff00" 
  }; 
}

// Return an array of all the parties
function getParties() {
  return Object.keys(tbl).filter(party => 
    party !== "Inscritos" && party !== "Votantes" && party !== "Abstenção" && party !== "Brancos" && party !== "Nulos" && party  !== "Votos Val. Exp. (VVE)"
  );
}

// Return the votes for all districts from the selected party
function partyVotesByDistrict(party) {
  const result = [];
  const partyData = tbl[party];

  for (let [Distrito, Votos] of Object.entries(partyData)) {
    // Make sure the "-" and "c.r" votes convert to 0
    Votos = parseInt(Votos) || 0;
    
    result.push({ Distrito, Votos });
  }

  return result.sort((a, b) => b.Votos - a.Votos);
}

// Return the the votes for all parties in the selected district
function districtVotes(districtName) {
  const result = [];

  for (const [Partido, Distritos] of Object.entries(tbl)) {
    if (Partido !== "Inscritos" && Partido !== "Votantes" && Partido !== "Abstenção" && Partido !== "Brancos" && Partido !== "Nulos" && Partido !== "Votos Val. Exp. (VVE)"
    ) {
      // Make sure the "-" and "c.r" votes convert to 0
      const Votos = parseInt(Distritos[districtName]) || 0;

      if (Votos !== undefined) {
        result.push({ Partido, Votos });
      }
    }
  }

  return result.sort((a, b) => b.Votos - a.Votos);
}

// Converts text to title case (First letter of each word capitalized)
function toTitleCase(str) {
  return str.toLowerCase().split(' ').map(word => {
    if(word !== "do")
      return word.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + word.slice(1);
    else
      return word;
  }).join(' ');
}

mutable selectedDistrict = "Lisboa";

// Create the map div
mainMapDiv = html `<div class="map" style="height: 400px;"></div>`

codeBlock = {
  // Create the map
  const mainMap = L.map(mainMapDiv, {
    zoomControl: true,
    dragging: true,
    scrollWheelZoom: true
  });

  // Tile layer loads and displays the base map imagery
  L.tileLayer('https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png').addTo(mainMap); 

  // Render the map
  const mainMapDistricts = L.geoJSON(data, {
    // Control colors, borders, and fill for polygons/lines
    style: (feat) => { 
      // Convert the district name from "VIANA DO CASTELO" to "Viana do Castelo"
      const district = toTitleCase(feat.properties?.Distrito);
      // Party with the most votes for the district
      const winner = districtVotes(district)[0]?.Partido;

      return {
        fillColor: getPartyColors()[winner] || "#b3afafab", // Set the district color to the winning party 
        color: "#ffffffcf",
        weight: 1,
        fillOpacity: 0.7 
      }; 
    },
    // Add popups, tooltips, or event handlers to each feature
    onEachFeature: (feat, layer) => {
      // Show the district name on hover
      layer.bindTooltip(toTitleCase(feat.properties?.Distrito), { sticky: true });

      // Allow the user to select a district
      layer.on("click", () => { 
        mutable selectedDistrict = toTitleCase(feat.properties?.Distrito); 
      }); 
    }
  }).addTo(mainMap);

  // Adjust the map limits to the group of districts (country) and centers intensity
  const resizeObserver = new ResizeObserver(() => {
    mainMap.invalidateSize();
    mainMap.fitBounds(mainMapDistricts.getBounds()); // Re-center to Portugal
  });
  resizeObserver.observe(mainMapDiv);
}

// Get the abstention for the selected district and the total abstention
selectedDistrictAbstention = `${tbl["Abstenção"][selectedDistrict].toFixed(2)}%`;
totalAbstention = `${tbl["Abstenção"].Total.toFixed(2)}%`;

// Get the total of registered people
totalRegistered = tbl["Inscritos"].Total;

// Return the ranking of abstention
function getRanking(district) {
  const table = tbl["Abstenção"];

  // Remove the total and sorts the array from lowest to highest
  const sortedArray = Object.entries(table).filter(([district]) => district !== "Total").sort((a, b) => a[1] - b[1]);

  // Find the array index from the district name
  const ranking = sortedArray.findIndex(([name]) => name === district);

  // Sum 1 because of array indexing
  return ranking + 1;
}

html`<div>

  <p><strong>Total de Inscritos:</strong> ${totalRegistered}</p>
</div>`
```

```{ojs}
// Returns the intensity of votes in the selected district for the selected party
function calculateIntensity(party, district) {
  // Party votes for the selected district
  const partyVotes = parseInt(tbl[party]?.[district]) || 0;
  // Total votes of all parties for the district
  const districtVotes = tbl["Votantes"]?.[district] || 1;

  return partyVotes / districtVotes;
}
```

# Sunburst

```{ojs}
//| expandable: false

function convertByParty() {
  const root = { name: "Portugal", children: [] };

  getParties().forEach(partido => {
    const partidoNode = { name: partido, children: [] };

    for (const [distrito, votos] of Object.entries(tbl[partido])) {
      if(distrito !== "Total")
        partidoNode.children.push({ name: distrito, value: votos });
    }

    root.children.push(partidoNode);
  });

  return root;
}

flareData = convertByParty();

chart = {
  // Specify the chart’s dimensions.
  const width = 600;
  const height = width;
  const radius = width / 6;

  // Compute the layout.
  const hierarchy = d3.hierarchy(flareData)
      .sum(d => d.value)
      .sort((a, b) => b.value - a.value);

  const root = d3.partition()
      .size([2 * Math.PI, hierarchy.height + 1])
    (hierarchy);

  root.each(d => d.current = d);

  // Create the arc generator.
  const arc = d3.arc()
      .startAngle(d => d.x0)
      .endAngle(d => d.x1)
      .padAngle(d => Math.min((d.x1 - d.x0) / 2, 0.005))
      .padRadius(radius * 1.5)
      .innerRadius(d => d.y0 * radius)
      .outerRadius(d => Math.max(d.y0 * radius, d.y1 * radius - 1))

  // Create the SVG container.
  const svg = d3.create("svg")
      .attr("viewBox", [-width / 2, -height / 2, width, width])
      .style("font", "8px sans-serif");

  // Append the arcs.
  const path = svg.append("g")
    .selectAll("path")
    .data(root.descendants().slice(1))
    .join("path")
      .attr("fill", d => { while(d.depth > 1) d = d.parent; return getPartyColors()[d.data.name] || "#b3afafab"; })
      .attr("fill-opacity", d => arcVisible(d.current) ? (d.children ? 0.6 : 0.4) : 0)
      .attr("pointer-events", d => arcVisible(d.current) ? "auto" : "none")
      .attr("d", d => arc(d.current));

  // Make them clickable if they have children.
  path.filter(d => d.children)
      .style("cursor", "pointer")
      .on("click", clicked);

  const format = d3.format(",d");
  path.append("title")
      .text(d => `${d.ancestors().map(d => d.data.name).reverse().join("/")}\n${format(d.value)}`);

  const label = svg.append("g")
      .attr("pointer-events", "none")
      .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
      .style("user-select", "none")
    .selectAll("text")
    .data(root.descendants().slice(1))
    .join("text")
      .attr("dy", "0.35em")
      .attr("fill-opacity", d => +labelVisible(d.current))
      .attr("transform", d => labelTransform(d.current))
      .text(d => d.data.name);

  const parent = svg.append("circle")
      .datum(root)
      .attr("r", radius)
      .attr("fill", "none")
      .attr("pointer-events", "all")
      .on("click", clicked);

  // Handle zoom on click.
  function clicked(event, p) {
    parent.datum(p.parent || root);

    root.each(d => d.target = {
      x0: Math.max(0, Math.min(1, (d.x0 - p.x0) / (p.x1 - p.x0))) * 2 * Math.PI,
      x1: Math.max(0, Math.min(1, (d.x1 - p.x0) / (p.x1 - p.x0))) * 2 * Math.PI,
      y0: Math.max(0, d.y0 - p.depth),
      y1: Math.max(0, d.y1 - p.depth)
    });

    const t = svg.transition().duration(event.altKey ? 7500 : 750);

    // Transition the data on all arcs, even the ones that aren’t visible,
    // so that if this transition is interrupted, entering arcs will start
    // the next transition from the desired position.
    path.transition(t)
        .tween("data", d => {
          const i = d3.interpolate(d.current, d.target);
          return t => d.current = i(t);
        })
      .filter(function(d) {
        return +this.getAttribute("fill-opacity") || arcVisible(d.target);
      })
        .attr("fill-opacity", d => arcVisible(d.target) ? (d.children ? 0.6 : 0.4) : 0)
        .attr("pointer-events", d => arcVisible(d.target) ? "auto" : "none") 

        .attrTween("d", d => () => arc(d.current));

    label.filter(function(d) {
        return +this.getAttribute("fill-opacity") || labelVisible(d.target);
      }).transition(t)
        .attr("fill-opacity", d => +labelVisible(d.target))
        .attrTween("transform", d => () => labelTransform(d.current));
  }
  
  function arcVisible(d) {
    return d.y1 <= 3 && d.y0 >= 1 && d.x1 > d.x0;
  }

  function labelVisible(d) {
    return d.y1 <= 3 && d.y0 >= 1 && (d.y1 - d.y0) * (d.x1 - d.x0) > 0.03;
  }

  function labelTransform(d) {
    const x = (d.x0 + d.x1) / 2 * 180 / Math.PI;
    const y = (d.y0 + d.y1) / 2 * radius;
    return `rotate(${x - 90}) translate(${y},0) rotate(${x < 180 ? 0 : 180})`;
  }

  svg.attr("width", "100%").attr("height", "80vh");

  const sunburstDiv = html `<div style="height: 80vh; width: 100%;"> 
                ${svg.node()} </div>`;

  return sunburstDiv;
}
```

```{ojs}
//| expandable: false

// GeoJSON data 
municipalitiesData = FileAttachment("data/Portugal_Municipalities.geojson").json()
// Elections data
muniTbl = FileAttachment("data/Legislativas2.json").json()

// Create the map div
municipalitiesMapDiv = html `<div class="map" style="height: 400px;"></div>`

function getPartyVotes(municipality) {
  const result = [];

  for(const [Concelho, Partidos] of Object.entries(muniTbl)) {
    if(Concelho === municipality) {
      for(const[Partido, Votos] of Object.entries(Partidos)) {
        if(Partido !== "Brancos" && Partido !== "Nulos" && Partido !== "Votantes" && Partido !== "Inscritos") {
          result.push({ Partido, Votos });
        }
      }
    }
  }

  return result.sort((a, b) => b.Votos - a.Votos);
}

// Formats the municipalities strings to the correct format
function toTitleCaseMunicipalities(str) {
  if(str.includes("-")) {
    return str.toLowerCase().split('-').map(word => {
      if(word.length > 1)
        return word.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + word.slice(1);
      else
        return word;
  }).join('-');
  } else {
    return str.toLowerCase().split(' ').map(word => {
    if(word !== "do" && word !== "da" && word !== "de" && word !== "dos" && word !== "das" && word !== "à")
      return word.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + word.slice(1);
    else
      return word;
  }).join(' ');
  }
}

mutable selectedMunicipality = "Lisboa";

municipalitiesCodeBlock = {
  // Create the map
  const municipalitiesMap = L.map(municipalitiesMapDiv, {
    zoomControl: true,
    dragging: true,
    scrollWheelZoom: true
  });

  // Tile layer loads and displays the base map imagery
  L.tileLayer('https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png').addTo(municipalitiesMap); 

  // Render the map
  const municipalitiesMapDistricts = L.geoJSON(municipalitiesData, {
    // Control colors, borders, and fill for polygons/lines
    style: (feat) => {
      
      let concelho = null;

      if(feat.properties?.Concelho)
        concelho = toTitleCaseMunicipalities(feat.properties?.Concelho);
      else if(feat.properties?.MUNICIPIO)
        concelho = toTitleCaseMunicipalities(feat.properties?.MUNICIPIO);

      const winner = getPartyVotes(concelho)[0]?.Partido;

      return {
        fillColor: getPartyColors()[winner] || "#b3afafab",
        color: "#ffffffcf",
        weight: 1,
        fillOpacity: 0.7 
      }; 
    },
    // Add popups, tooltips, or event handlers to each feature
    onEachFeature: (feat, layer) => {
      let concelho = null;

      if(feat.properties?.Concelho)
        concelho = toTitleCaseMunicipalities(feat.properties?.Concelho);
      else if(feat.properties?.MUNICIPIO)
        concelho = toTitleCaseMunicipalities(feat.properties?.MUNICIPIO);
      
      // Show the district name on hover
      layer.bindTooltip(concelho, { sticky: true });

      // Allow the user to select a district
      layer.on("click", () => { 
        mutable selectedMunicipality = concelho; 
      }); 
    }
  }).addTo(municipalitiesMap);

  // Adjust the map limits to the group of municipalities and centers it
  const resizeObserver = new ResizeObserver(() => {
    municipalitiesMap.invalidateSize();
    municipalitiesMap.fitBounds(municipalitiesMapDistricts.getBounds()); // Re-center to Portugal
  });
  resizeObserver.observe(municipalitiesMapDiv);
}
```

```{ojs}
chart2 = {
  const data = getPartyVotes(selectedMunicipality);
  
  const barHeight = 25;
  const marginTop = 30;
  const marginRight = 0;
  const marginBottom = 10;
  const marginLeft = 100;
  const width = 928;
  const height = Math.ceil((data.length + 0.1) * barHeight) + marginTop + marginBottom;

  const x = d3.scaleLinear()
      .domain([0, d3.max(data, d => d.Votos)])
      .range([marginLeft, width - marginRight]);
  
  const y = d3.scaleBand()
      .domain(d3.sort(data, d => -d.Votos).map(d => d.Partido))
      .rangeRound([marginTop, height - marginBottom])
      .padding(0.1);

  const format = d3.format(",d");

  const svg = d3.create("svg")
      .attr("width", width)
      .attr("height", height)
      .attr("viewBox", [0, 0, width, height])
      .attr("style", "max-width: 100%; height: auto; font: 10px sans-serif;");
  
  svg.append("g")
      .attr("fill", "#006600")
    .selectAll()
    .data(data)
    .join("rect")
      .attr("x", x(0))
      .attr("y", (d) => y(d.Partido))
      .attr("width", (d) => x(d.Votos) - x(0))
      .attr("height", y.bandwidth())
      .attr("rx", 5)
      .attr("ry", 5);

  svg.append("g")
      .attr("fill", "white")
      .attr("text-anchor", "end")
    .selectAll()
    .data(data)
    .join("text")
      .attr("x", (d) => x(d.Votos))
      .attr("y", (d) => y(d.Partido) + y.bandwidth() / 2)
      .attr("font-weight", "bold")
      .attr("dy", "0.35em")
      .attr("dx", -10)
      .text((d) => format(d.Votos))
    .call((text) => text.filter(d => x(d.Votos) - x(0) < 40)
      .attr("dx", +4)
      .attr("fill", "black")
      .attr("font-weight", "bold")
      .attr("text-anchor", "start"));

  svg.append("g")
      .attr("transform", `translate(0,${marginTop})`)
      .call(d3.axisTop(x).ticks(width / 80))
      .call(g => g.select(".domain").remove());

  svg.append("g")
      .attr("transform", `translate(${marginLeft},0)`)
      .call(d3.axisLeft(y).tickSizeOuter(0));

  return svg.node();
}
```

```{ojs}
//| expandable: false

html `<p style="text-align: center; padding-block: 15px"><strong>Abstenção por Município (%)</p>`;

scatterPlot = {
  // Prepare data for scatter plot
  const scatterData = [];
  
  for (const [Concelho, data] of Object.entries(muniTbl)) {
    // Skip "Território Nacional"
    if (Concelho === "Território Nacional") continue;
    
    const inscritos = data["Inscritos"];
    const votantes = data["Votantes"];
    
    // Calculate abstention rate
    const abstencao = inscritos > 0 ? ((inscritos - votantes) / inscritos) * 100 : 0;
    
    // Get winning party
    const winner = getPartyVotes(Concelho)[0]?.Partido || "Unknown";
    
    scatterData.push({
      concelho: Concelho,
      inscritos: inscritos,
      abstencao: abstencao,
      partido: winner
    });
  }
  
  // Set up dimensions
  const width = 928;
  const height = 500;
  const marginTop = 20;
  const marginRight = 20;
  const marginBottom = 40;
  const marginLeft = 60;
  
  // Create scales
  const x = d3.scaleLinear()
    .domain([0, d3.max(scatterData, d => d.inscritos)])
    .nice()
    .range([marginLeft, width - marginRight]);
  
  const y = d3.scaleLinear()
    .domain([0, d3.max(scatterData, d => d.abstencao)])
    .nice()
    .range([height - marginBottom, marginTop]);
  
  // Create SVG
  const svg = d3.create("svg")
    .attr("width", width)
    .attr("height", height)
    .attr("viewBox", [0, 0, width, height])
    .attr("style", "max-width: 100%; height: auto;");
  
  // Add X axis
  svg.append("g")
    .attr("transform", `translate(0,${height - marginBottom})`)
    .call(d3.axisBottom(x).ticks(width / 80))
    .call(g => g.select(".domain").remove())
    .call(g => g.append("text")
      .attr("x", width - marginRight)
      .attr("y", 35)
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("text-anchor", "end")
      .attr("font-weight", "bold")
      .text("Inscritos →"));
  
  // Add Y axis
  svg.append("g")
    .attr("transform", `translate(${marginLeft},0)`)
    .call(d3.axisLeft(y).ticks(height / 40))
    .call(g => g.select(".domain").remove())
    .call(g => g.append("text")
      .attr("x", -marginLeft)
      .attr("y", 10)
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("text-anchor", "start")
      .attr("font-weight", "bold")
      .text("↑ Abstenção (%)"));
  
  // Add grid lines
  svg.append("g")
    .attr("stroke", "currentColor")
    .attr("stroke-opacity", 0.1)
    .call(g => g.append("g")
      .selectAll("line")
      .data(x.ticks())
      .join("line")
        .attr("x1", d => x(d))
        .attr("x2", d => x(d))
        .attr("y1", marginTop)
        .attr("y2", height - marginBottom))
    .call(g => g.append("g")
      .selectAll("line")
      .data(y.ticks())
      .join("line")
        .attr("y1", d => y(d))
        .attr("y2", d => y(d))
        .attr("x1", marginLeft)
        .attr("x2", width - marginRight));
  
  // Create label group for municipality names
  const labels = svg.append("g")
    .attr("font-size", 12)
    .attr("font-weight", "bold")
    .attr("text-anchor", "middle");
  
  const circleLayer = svg.append("g").attr("class", "circle-layer");
  const labelLayer = svg.append("g").attr("class", "label-layer");

  // Add dots
  circleLayer.selectAll("circle")
    .data(scatterData)
    .join("circle")
      .attr("cx", d => x(d.inscritos))
      .attr("cy", d => y(d.abstencao))
      .attr("r", 4)
      .attr("fill", d => getPartyColors()[d.partido] || "#b3afafab")
      .attr("fill-opacity", 0.7)
      .attr("stroke", "white")
      .attr("stroke-width", 0.5)
      .style("cursor", "pointer")
      .on("mouseover", function(event, d) {
        d3.select(this)
          .attr("r", 6)
          .attr("fill-opacity", 1);
        
        // Show municipality name
        labelLayer.append("text")
          .attr("class", "hover-label")
          .attr("x", x(d.inscritos))
          .attr("y", y(d.abstencao) - 12)
          .attr("fill", "black")
          .attr("stroke", "white")
          .attr("stroke-width", 3)
          .attr("paint-order", "stroke")
          .text(d.concelho);
      })
      .on("mouseout", function() {
        d3.select(this)
          .attr("r", 4)
          .attr("fill-opacity", 0.7);
        
        // Remove municipality name
        labelLayer.selectAll(".hover-label").remove();
      });

  const div = html `<div style="text-align: center">${svg.node()}</div>`;
  
  return div;
}
```
